update.description: Various fixes and enhancements.
Various fixes and enhancements.
You can now send HOC photos through email for Battle Against Contamination.
You can now close some cases directly from CAAG.
New icons for open and closed cases.
New icons for open and resolved tickets.
Various fixes and enhancements.

subList.subListDescr: Fixed issue of wrong service icons displayed at 80% zoom-in.
CAAG internal enhancement to enable build for different environments.

update.description: Various fixes and enhancements.

subList.subListDescr: Changed CAAG ETA to match what on WM.com.
Activity Feed: Fixed date of service hard to read issue.
Fixed issue of no ETA calculated when a service is planned for a date other than today.
Activity Feed: Planned services now sorted by the ordered_date currently labeled as 'scheduled for'.
Map Preview: Fixed blank window issue.
Fixed issue of container shifting at 2370px wide.
Edit Contact Info: Allow email address case to change.

update.description: Any customer with services today will now display the service vehicle en route on a map.
Click any stop marker for more information.
Check out what's new in CAAG with the ‘latest updates’ feature.
Toggle between Fahrenheit and Celsius by clicking on the temperature.
Various fixes and enhancements.

subList.subListDescr: Edit Contact Info: Fixed a bug where sometimes you can't get to the second screen.
Activity Feed: Case summary now shows: Category - Subcategory - Subject.
Activity Feed: Now showing residential services as negative when the HOC exception reason is ‘Not Out / Container Empty‘.
Activity Feed: Changed service label from ‘Ordered By‘ to ‘Scheduled For‘ to better represent the meaning of that field.

update.description: More activity entries will now load once you reach the bottom of the feed.
You can now add MAS Notes.
Cases make their debut on activity feed.
Filters have a simpler, more streamlined look.
An Estimated Time of Arrival for planned services is now displayed.
New icons notify you if the container is still full or has been serviced.
All service exceptions now sport a notification icon.
